name: Lava Bp Post
author: Lavacode

sections.description:
Lava Bp Post is for buddypress. It provides a frontend form in buddypress user (profile) nav tab. It’s also possible to add on pages by a form shortcode.
This plugin enables you to use the power and flexibility of BuddyPress in WordPress to generate blog posts in user (profile) nav tab and a frontend form in a page.

FEATURES

  • BuddyPress nav tab supported.
  • Approval option for new posts
  • Features images supported.
  • Detail images supported.
  • List of posts in BuddyPress nav tab (User Profile) supported.
  • Edit, Delete options supported for users ( Front-end )
  • Submit form shortcode supported.
  • Without Login, it’s possible to submit posts.
  • Without Login, automatically register new members supported.
  • Buddypress 2.9 compatible
  • Responsive design
  • Etc

LANGUAGES

  • English (default)
    We are happy to have volunteer to assist to translate in your own languages.
    Please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com , if you are interested. We will add it on next update.

Intro page : http://lava-code.com/bp-post
Documentation : http://lava-code.com/bp-post/documentation/
Demo site : http://lava-code.com/bp-post/demo/

Languages

It is currently (v0.1) available only English version. we are happy to have volunteer to assist to translate in your own languages.
Please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com , if you are interested.
Thank you in advance.
sections.installation:
Install via Search:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “lava bp post”
  3. Click the “Install Now” link.
  4. Once installed, click the “Activate Plugin” link.
  5. Visit settings to setup pages

Install via Upload:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit “Plugins” > “Add New” > “Upload”
  2. Upload lava-bp-post.zip file
  3. Once uploaded, click the “Activate Plugin” link
  4. Visit settings to setup pages

That’s it!
If you need more documentation, please visit here ( http://lava-code.com/bp-post/documentation/ )
sections.faq:
Can I use my existing WordPress theme?

Yes! Lava BP post works out-of-the-box with nearly every WordPress theme.

Will this work on WordPress multisite?

Yes! If your WordPress installation has multisite enabled, Lava BP Post will work on it.

Where can I get support?

We will open our own support site soon. or please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com.

Where can I find documentation?

Our codex can be found at http://lava-
code.com/bp-post/documentation/.

Where can I report a bug?

Report bugs, suggest ideas, and participate in development at wp.lava.code@gmail.com .
sections.changelog:
1.0.10

  • Improved : Backend > Save post > Check post type

1.0.9.1

  • Improved : Backend > Save post > Check post type

1.0.9

  • Fixed : Settings page issue fix

1.0.8

  • Fixed : Undefined variable $lava_bp_admin issue fix

1.0.7

  • Added : Backend > Post > Settings > Admin Notice & Author message to admin > Added description
  • Improved : Backend > Show post excerpt box

1.0.6

  • Fixed : Single post > Script undefined variable issue.
  • Fixed : Single post > Preview mode > Publish button not working issue
  • Improved : Textdomain update
  • Improved : POT file

1.0.5

  • Fixed : Preview 404 page issue for non admin users.

1.0.4

  • Fixed : Display comments on posts.

1.0.3

  • Fixed : Single Post > Display not category, author name issue.
  • Fixed : Single Post > Detail image slider issue
  • Added : Add form > Added category field
  • Added : Settings > Added limit select category option
  • Fixed : Fix strings ‘listing’ & ‘directory manager’ & hook & CSS selector
  • Changed : No Image file

1.0.2

  • Improved : Removed unused settings
  • Add : Shortcode > My Dashboard > Shortcode title can changed
  • Fixed : Shortcode > Add Form > Not User logged > Show error message issue.
  • Improved : Buddypress > Member single > My Posts > Display only current user items

1.0.1

  • Fixed : Shortcode > Add form > Load template function issue

  • Fixed : Shortcode > Add form > Not loading detail images issue

  • Initial release
